content: **crochet hat in drops safran size children 3 to 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see sweet berries dress pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-007-bn yarn group a -------------------------------------------------------- **size** 3/5 - 6/8 - 10/12 years head circumference 48/50 - 51/53 - 54/56 cm / 19 /19 3/4 - 20 /21 - 21 1/4 /22 **materials** drops safran from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes in color no 13 raspberry 50 g for all sizes in color no 02 medium pink 50 g for all sizes in color no 31 lime drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c - or size needed to get 1 square = approx 5 x 5 cm / 2 x 2 with a light pull and 23 sts x 17 row with pattern = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/s23-49-sweet-berry-dress
